sentences: Ta on kasutanud seda arvutit varem.
Kas sa oled juba kasutanud uut tarkvara?
Meie firma on kasutanud sama meetodit kolm aastat.
context: The word 'kasutanud' is the past tense (perfect form) of the Estonian verb 'kasutama', which means 'to use'. It follows the standard Estonian past tense conjugation pattern for regular -ma verbs. The form indicates that someone has used or utilized something at some point in the past.
